trans-unit.source: Watch preprocessor
Watches and bundles your spec files via Rollup
Watches and bundles your spec files via browserify. This is the default preprocessor that's built into Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 通过 browserify 监视和捆绑你的规格文件。这是Cypress内置的默认预处理器。

trans-unit.source: Watches and bundles your spec files via webpack.
trans-unit.target: 通过webpack监视和捆绑你的规格文件。

trans-unit.source: Watches your spec files and serves them as-is. Useful as an example reference or if you don't need transpiling/bundling.
trans-unit.target: 监视你的规格文件并按原样提供。如果你不需要转码/捆绑,可以作为一个参考例子。

trans-unit.source: Watching and caching files
trans-unit.target: 监视和缓存文件

trans-unit.source: Watching tests
trans-unit.target: 观看测试

trans-unit.source: We added aliasing support to stub and spy APIs.
trans-unit.target: 我们为 stub 和 spy API 添加了别名支持。

trans-unit.source: We also display an error if your server is not running at the specified baseUrl during cypress run after several retries.
trans-unit.target: 如果在多次重试后 cypress run 期间您的服务器未在指定的 baseUrl 上运行，我们也会显示错误。

trans-unit.source: We also ensure that the element we’re attempting to interact with isn’t covered by a parent element.
trans-unit.target: 我们还要确保尝试与之交互的元素不会被父元素覆盖。

trans-unit.source: We also have the power of Cypress parallelization with our groups. For the sake of demonstration, let’s run a group to test against Chrome with 2 machines, a group to test against Electron with 4 machines, and another group to test against Electron again, but only with one machine:
trans-unit.target: 我们也拥有赛普拉斯与我们团队并行化的能力。为了演示起见，让我们运行一个小组使用2台计算机对Chrome进行测试，一个小组使用4台计算机对Electron进行测试，以及另一个小组（仅使用一台计算机）对Electron进行测试：

trans-unit.source: We also integrated all of these APIs directly into the Command Log, so you can visually see what’s happening in your application.
trans-unit.target: 我们还将所有这些API直接集成到命令日志中，因此您可以直观地看到应用程序中正在发生的事情。

trans-unit.source: We also support passing an absolute path to the reporter.
trans-unit.target: 我们还支持向记者传递一个绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: We also updated and removed some dependencies used for development.
trans-unit.target: 我们还更新并删除了一些用于开发的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: We also updated many dependencies used for development and removed some unused dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 我们还更新了许多用于开发的依赖项,并删除了一些未使用的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: We are adding several other recipes to show examples of all the ways you can use cy.request() to improve your tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们将添加其他几条秘诀，以展示使用 cy.request() 改善测试的所有方法的示例。

trans-unit.source: We are adding support for unit testing in the near future and decided that there needs to be a separation between unit and integration tests. The actual runner will handle these two sets of specs very differently. It’s important to make the change now so when we do add support for unit tests, you only have to create a unit folder inside of your cypress folder.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在不久的将来增加对单元测试的支持，并决定在 unit 测试和 integration 测试之间需要分开。实际的跑步者将处理这两组规格非常不同。现在进行更改很重要，因此当我们添加对单元测试的支持时，只需在 cypress 文件夹内创建一个 unit 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: We are aware of issues running in CI with Linux builds, and are working through those issues.
trans-unit.target: 我们意识到在CI中运行的Linux构建的问题,并正在解决这些问题。

trans-unit.source: We are cleaning up internal __cypress cookies more so they won’t get in the way of testing your application.
trans-unit.target: 我们将进一步清理内部 __cypress cookie，以便它们不会妨碍测试您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: We are not limited to a single interaction and assertion in a given test. In fact, many interactions in an application may require multiple steps and are likely to change your application state in more than one way.
trans-unit.target: 我们并不局限于给定测试中的单一交互和断言。事实上,应用程序中的许多交互可能需要多个步骤,并可能以多种方式改变您的应用程序状态。

trans-unit.source: We are now aggressively turning on colors when running in CI. If you’re using Jenkins and do not have an ANSI color plugin installed, you can turn off colors with the NO_COLOR=1 environment variable. Fixes #1747 and #1748.
trans-unit.target: 在CI中运行时，我们现在正在积极地打开颜色。如果您使用的是Jenkins，但未安装ANSI颜色插件，则可以使用 NO_COLOR=1 环境变量关闭颜色。修复＃1747和＃1748。

trans-unit.source: We are now bundling our own TypeScript definitions with the cypress npm module. You no longer have to install @types/cypress anymore. We’ll continue to keep these updated with API changes. Fixes #856.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将自己的 TypeScript 定义与 cypress npm模块捆绑在一起。您不再需要安装 @types/cypress 。我们将继续通过API更改对这些内容进行更新。修复＃856。

trans-unit.source: We are now capturing stdout and several other properties for use + display in our Dashboard on cypress ci runs.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们正在捕获 stdout 和其他几个属性，以供 cypress ci 运行时在我们的仪表板中使用+显示。

trans-unit.source: We are now capturing Google Cloud build details when recording tests to the Cypress Dashboard. Addresses #3582.
trans-unit.target: 在将测试记录到赛普拉斯仪表板时，我们现在正在捕获Google Cloud构建细节。地址＃3582。

trans-unit.source: We are now capturing the performance and timings data of every test when using --record mode and are beginning to offer the first analytics and insights into the health of your tests on our Dashboard Service.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当使用 --record 模式时，我们将捕获每个测试的性能和计时数据，并开始在Dashboard Service上提供有关测试运行状况的第一批分析和见解。

trans-unit.source: We are now clearing the browser’s disk cache each time it opens (before any tests run). This means that any files that have been cached from Cache-Control headers will be cleaned and removed. In the future, we will expose a new cy.clearCache() method to provide finer grained control of clearing the cache on a per test basis. But for now, this is an improvement. Fixes #1124.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们每次打开浏览器时都会清除其磁盘缓存（在运行任何测试之前）。这意味着将从 Cache-Control 标头缓存的所有文件都将被清除和删除。将来，我们将公开一个新的 cy.clearCache() 方法，以便在每次测试的基础上提供更细粒度的清除缓存的控制。但是现在，这是一个改进。修复＃1124。

trans-unit.source: We are now collecting more environment variables from runs when run in Semaphore, GitLab, Bitbucket, Team Foundation Server, Codeship, and Shippable. Fixes #2460, #2358, #2343, and #2453.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当在Semaphore，GitLab，Bitbucket，Team Foundation Server，Codeship和Shippable中运行时，我们将从运行中收集更多环境变量。修复＃2460，＃2358，＃2343和＃2453。

trans-unit.source: We are now counting and aggregating the stats at the end of test runs separately from Mocha. Cypress considers a test to be the it and any accompanying hooks that run before or after a test. Cypress will correctly associate failures in those hooks to the test itself. We believe this more accurately models and just “makes sense”. Fixes #1163.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在测试运行结束时与Mocha分开统计和汇总统计信息。赛普拉斯认为测试是 it 以及在测试之前或之后运行的所有附带的 hooks 。赛普拉斯会将这些挂钩中的故障正确地关联到测试本身。我们相信，此模型更准确，而且“很有意义”。修复＃1163。

trans-unit.source: We are now detecting and automatically stripping code that obstructs Cypress from being able to test your application. Specifically, we are removing JavaScript code that tries to prevent clickjacking and framebusting. We have written very conservative rules that do their best to only strip these specific JS snippets, but it is technically possible that it may unintentionally rewrite valid JS if they match the RegExp patterns. There is a new configuration option called modifyObstructiveCode that is true by default. If you are experiencing problems after upgrading, you can turn this off and this will disable modifying your JS code. If you were using Cypress and upon visiting your website you would experience seemingly “random” redirects - these problems should now be eliminated. Fixes #886 and #1245 and #1064 and #992 and #692 and #352.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们正在检测并自动剥离使赛普拉斯无法测试您的应用程序的代码。具体来说，我们正在删除JavaScript代码，试图阻止点击劫持和framebusting。我们已经编写了非常保守的规则，它们会尽最大努力仅剥离这些特定的JS代码段，但是从技术上讲，如果它们匹配RegExp模式，则可能会无意中重写有效的JS代码。有一个名为 modifyObstructiveCode 的新配置选项为 true 默认。如果升级后遇到问题，可以将其关闭，这将禁止修改JS代码。如果您使用的是赛普拉斯（Cypress），则在访问您的网站时会遇到看似“随机”的重定向-现在应消除这些问题。修复＃886和＃1245和＃1064和＃992和＃692和＃352。

trans-unit.source: We are now officially in the Cypress Test Runner. This is where we will spend the majority of your time testing.
trans-unit.target: 我们现已正式加入赛普拉斯测试赛跑者行列。这是我们将花费您大部分时间进行测试的地方。

trans-unit.source: We are now properly serializing nested object arguments when using the Module API via cypress.open() or cypress.run(). Passing nested objects in reporterOptions now works correctly. This is especially useful when using mocha-multi-reporters. In addition to fixing the Module API, we are now also properly handling nested arguments from the Command Line. In order to pass nested objects within CLI params you must pass stringified JSON. This is useful for properties such as blacklistHosts. Fixes #1348 and #1357 and #2221.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当通过 cypress.open() 或 cypress.run() 使用Module API时，我们可以正确地序列化嵌套对象参数。现在，可以在 reporterOptions 传递嵌套对象了。这在使用 mocha-multi-reporters 时特别有用。除了修复Module API之外，我们现在还可以从命令行正确处理嵌套参数。为了在CLI参数中传递嵌套对象，您必须传递字符串化的JSON。这对于诸如 blacklistHosts 之类的属性很有用。修复＃1348和＃1357和＃2221。

trans-unit.source: We are now taking additional precautions to prevent Cypress from trashing the wrong folder during an upgrade (with an open project). This was actually fixed in 0.17.7 but the problem was is that during an update, the new version (which was fixed) was still being passed the wrong arguments from the older (broken) application. We’ve now upgraded 0.17.8 to detect this, and just use the expected default install location of Cypress. If you’re concerned, just close your currently open project before updating. Fixes #265.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们正在采取其他预防措施，以防止赛普拉斯在升级过程中（打开的项目）破坏错误的文件夹。这实际上是在 0.17.7 中修复的，但问题是在更新期间，新版本（已修复）仍从较旧的（损坏的）应用程序传递了错误的参数。现在，我们已经升级了 0.17.8 以检测到此情况，并且仅使用Cypress的预期默认安装位置。如果您有顾虑，请在更新之前关闭当前打开的项目。修复＃265。

trans-unit.source: We are passing the --compact=false flag to generate human-friendly output.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在传递 --compact=false 标志以生成对人类友好的输出。

trans-unit.source: We are still updating the docs to reflect all of these changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们仍在更新文档以反映所有这些变化。

trans-unit.source: We are still updating the docs to reflect the 1.0.0 release.
trans-unit.target: 我们仍在更新文档以反映 1.0.0 版本。

trans-unit.source: We automatically normalize both the key and the value when passed via the command line. Cypress will automatically convert values into Number or Boolean.

We automatically normalize both the key and the value. Cypress will strip off the CYPRESS_, camelcase any keys and automatically convert values into Number or Boolean. Make sure to prefix your environment variables with CYPRESS_ else they will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 我们会自动将键和值标准化。柏树将剥离的 CYPRESS_ ，驼峰任何键和自动转换值转换成 Number 或 Boolean 。确保为环境变量加上 CYPRESS_ 前缀，否则它们将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: We automatically restore and tear down stub, spy, and clock between tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们会在测试之间自动恢复并删除 stub ， spy 和 clock 。

trans-unit.source: We automatically seed you an example support file, which has several commented out examples.
trans-unit.target: 我们会自动为您提供一个支持文件,其中有几个注释的例子。

trans-unit.source: We automatically spawn Chrome in a custom theme so you can visually distinguish the difference between browser sessions spawned with Cypress vs your normal sessions. We know this may feel a little jarring because you’re used to running Cypress alongside your other tabs. You will now see 2 chrome icons in your dock and you’ll need to switch between them. We know this is problematic and confusing and we’re looking into changing the icon of the Chrome running Cypress so it’s easier to tell the Chrome sessions apart.
trans-unit.target: 我们会以自定义主题自动生成Chrome，因此您可以从视觉上区分使用Cypress生成的浏览器会话与常规会话之间的区别。我们知道这可能会感到有点刺耳，因为您已经习惯在其他选项卡旁边运行赛普拉斯。现在，您会在扩展坞中看到2个Chrome图标，您需要在它们之间进行切换。我们知道这是有问题且令人困惑的，我们正在考虑更改运行Cypress的Chrome 的图标，以便更轻松地区分Chrome会话。

trans-unit.source: We began bulk converting some of our codebase from CoffeeScript to JavaScript. Fixes #2686 and #2687.
trans-unit.target: 我们开始将某些代码库从CoffeeScript批量转换为JavaScript。修复＃2686和＃2687。

trans-unit.source: We believe our documentation should be simple and approachable. This means enabling our readers to understand fully not just the what but the why as well.
trans-unit.target: 我们认为我们的文档应该简单易懂。这意味着使读者充分了解不只是什么，但为什么还有。

trans-unit.source: We believe testing needs a lot of and we are here to build a tool, a service, and a community that everyone can learn and benefit from. We’re solving the hardest pain points shared by every developer working on the web. We believe in this mission and hope that you will join us to make Cypress a lasting ecosystem that helps everyone happy.
trans-unit.target: 我们认为测试需要大量资源，我们在这里建立每个人都可以学习并受益的工具，服务和社区。我们正在解决每个从事网络工作的开发人员所面临的最艰巨的痛点。我们相信这一使命，并希望您能加入我们，使赛普拉斯成为一个持久的生态系统，可以帮助每个人幸福。

trans-unit.source: We build every commit in the develop branch for each platform and test it against downstream projects. For example, in the image below the last commit has the short SHA e5106d9.
trans-unit.target: 我们在每个平台的 develop 分支中构建每个提交，并针对下游项目进行测试。例如，在下面的图像中，最后一个提交具有较短的SHA e5106d9 。

trans-unit.source: We can continue the interactions and assertions in this test by adding another chain to interact with and verify the behavior of elements on this new page.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以在这个测试中继续进行交互和断言,添加另一个链来与这个新页面上的元素交互并验证其行为。

trans-unit.source: We can directly test this piece of code by importing the getVisibleTodos function from the Cypress spec file. In essense we are using the Cypress Test Runner as a unit testing tool (find more unit testing recipes here).
trans-unit.target: 我们可以通过从Cypress规范文件中导入 getVisibleTodos 函数来直接测试这段代码。实质上，我们将赛普拉斯测试运行器用作单元测试工具（在此处查找更多的单元测试方法）。

trans-unit.source: We can even expand what was returned and inspect each individual element or even right click and inspect them in the Elements panel!
trans-unit.target: 我们甚至可以展开返回的内容,检查每一个单独的元素,甚至可以在元素面板中右键点击并检查它们!

trans-unit.source: We can move this into an environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以把它移到一个环境变量中。

trans-unit.source: We can now generate a combined HTML report from the mochawesome.json file using the https://github.com/adamgruber/mochawesome-report-generator:
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以使用https://github.com/adamgruber/mochawesome-report-generator从 mochawesome.json 文件生成组合的HTML报告：

trans-unit.source: We can now handle multiple projects per server. Fixes #512.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们每个服务器可以处理多个项目。修复＃512。

trans-unit.source: We can now serve the application and get instrumented code without an intermediate folder, but the result is the same instrumented code loaded by the browser, with the same window.__coverage__ object keeping track of the original statements.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以在不使用中间文件夹的情况下为应用程序提供服务并获取检测代码，但是结果是浏览器加载的检测代码相同，并且具有相同的 window.__coverage__ 对象跟踪原始语句。

trans-unit.source: We can now visit a relative path and omit the hostname and port.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在可以访问一个相对路径,省略主机名和端口。

trans-unit.source: We can prevent Cypress from throwing this error by rewriting our test code.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以通过重写测试代码来防止Cypress抛出这个错误。

trans-unit.source: We can rewrite the previous example in a more terse way and add an assertion.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以用更简洁的方式重写前面的例子,并添加一个断言。

trans-unit.source: We can save the variable and retrieve the saved variable outside of the test using cy.task() as shown below.

We can use cy.get() to select an element based on a CSS class. Then we can use the .type() command to enter text into the selected input. Finally, we can verify that the value of the input reflects the text that was typed with another .should().
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 cy.get() 选择基于CSS类的元素。然后，我们可以使用 .type() 命令将文本输入到选定的输入中。最后，我们可以验证输入的值是否反映了使用另一个 .should() 输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: We can write a test to confirm that the method setProperty was called with two strings; we don’t care about value of the first string, but we do want to check if it was indeed a string.
We can write more E2E tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以多写一些E2E测试。

trans-unit.source: We can yield the location object within a .should() command and work with it directly.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以在 .should() 命令中产生location对象并直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: We changed Cypress’s implementation to no longer rely on internal XHR events when the browser navigates. This fixes a a bug in Chrome 71+ that could cause XHRs to pend forever. Fixes #3973 and #4130
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器导航时，我们将赛普拉斯的实现方式更改为不再依赖内部XHR事件。这修复了Chrome 71+中的一个bug，该bug可能导致XHR永久终止。修复＃3973和＃4130

trans-unit.source: We could make our code do some ugly backflips using let to get access to it.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 let 来使我们的代码进行一些难看的后空翻。

trans-unit.source: We could not determine a unique CI build ID
trans-unit.target: 我们无法确定一个唯一的CI构建ID

trans-unit.source: We currently have the following downloads available:
trans-unit.target: 我们目前有以下下载:

trans-unit.source: We did not write an automatic migration from tests -> cypress
trans-unit.target: 我们没有从 tests 编写自动迁移-> cypress

trans-unit.source: We display errors coming from babel with more helpful information now.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在显示来自 babel 的错误，并提供更多有用的信息。

trans-unit.source: We do NOT recommend trying to start your back end web server from within Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 我们不建议从Cypress内部启动您的后端网络服务器。

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend starting a web server using cy.task(). Read about best practices here.
trans-unit.target: 我们不建议使用 cy.task() 启动Web服务器。在此处了解最佳做法。

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend starting a web server using cy.task(). Read about best practices here.
We expose Cypress.minimatch as a function that you can use in your console to test routes.
trans-unit.target: 我们将 Cypress.minimatch 公开为可在控制台中用于测试路由的函数。

trans-unit.source: We finally have partial iframe support. You can at least now cy.wrap() iframe elements and interact with them using Cypress commands. More work needs to be done to “switch into” and back “out of” iframes. But we’re getting there.
trans-unit.target: 我们终于有了部分 iframe支持。您至少现在可以使用 cy.wrap() iframe元素，并使用Cypress命令与它们进行交互。要“切换到” iframe和“退出” iframe，还需要做更多的工作。但是我们到了那里。

trans-unit.source: We fixed a regression introduced in 3.3.0 that was causing the Test Runner to do extremely unnecessary re-renders of the Command Log on any command change - leading to exponential performance degradation on any run. This was the root cause behind many users experiencing a reduction in performance when upgrading to 3.3.0 or above. Fixes #4411 and #4313.
trans-unit.target: 我们修复了3.3.0中引入的回归，该回归导致测试运行器在任何命令更改时对命令日志进行极其不必要的重新渲染-导致任何运行时性能均呈指数下降。这是许多用户升级到 3.3.0 或更高版本时性能下降的根本原因。修复＃4411和＃4313。

trans-unit.source: We fixed an issue involving timers after running cy.screenshot(). Fixes #2432.
trans-unit.target: 我们在运行 cy.screenshot() 之后解决了涉及计时器的问题。修复＃2432。

trans-unit.source: We fixed an issue where the ignoreTestFiles configuration was being filtered out when passed via a command line flag, so in effect being ignored. Fixes #1696.
trans-unit.target: 我们修复了以下问题：通过命令行标志传递时， ignoreTestFiles 配置被过滤掉，因此实际上被忽略了。修复＃1696。

trans-unit.source: We fixed situations during a test failure where the Test Runner would throw RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded. Fixes #1958 and #4346.
trans-unit.target: 我们修复了在测试失败时测试运行程序将抛出 RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded 。修复＃1958和＃4346。

trans-unit.source: We found an error preparing your test file
trans-unit.target: 我们发现在准备您的测试文件时出现了错误

trans-unit.source: We greatly improved the speed of proxied requests through our network layer. Fixes #3192 and #1469.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过网络层极大地提高了代理请求的速度。修复＃3192和＃1469。

trans-unit.source: We have examples showing you how to start and stop your web server.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些示例向您展示如何启动和停止Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: We have created an official cypress/base container with all of the required dependencies installed. Just add Cypress and go! We are also adding images with browsers pre-installed under cypress/browsers name. A typical Dockerfile would look like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个正式的cypress / base容器，其中安装了所有必需的依赖项。只需添加赛普拉斯即可！我们还将使用预先安装在cypress / browsers名称下的浏览器添加图像。典型的Dockerfile如下所示：

trans-unit.source: We have open issues where you can find a full list of things Cypress will eventually address, we wanted to highlight some of the more important temporary restrictions that Cypress will eventually address. PRs are welcome ;-)
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些未解决的问题，您可以找到赛普拉斯最终解决的所有问题的完整列表，我们想强调赛普拉斯最终解决的一些更重要的临时限制。欢迎PR ;-)

trans-unit.source: We have a Contributing Guideline to help contributors get started as well as issues labeled first-timers-only for those wanting to contribute right away.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个供稿指南，可帮助供稿者入门，以及 first-timers-only 问题（仅供那些希望立即供稿的人）。

trans-unit.source: We have a much more detailed and comprehensive guide on routing Network Requests.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个更详细和全面的路由网络请求指南。

trans-unit.source: We have added better checks and reliability for detecting runs in Jenkins. Fixes #1990.
trans-unit.target: 我们增加了更好的检查和可靠性，以检测Jenkins中的运行。修复＃1990。

trans-unit.source: We have added support for more CI providers to automatically detect and show more relevant information in the Dashboard, instead of showing ‘Unknown’. Fixes #2146.
trans-unit.target: 我们增加了对更多CI提供程序的支持，以自动检测并在仪表板中显示更多相关信息，而不是显示“未知”。修复＃2146。

trans-unit.source: We have added the first Plugin API event called: file:preprocessor. Fixes #580 and #581.
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了第一个插件API事件： file:preprocessor 。修复＃580和＃581。

trans-unit.source: We have all new docker examples you can check out.
trans-unit.target: 我们有所有新的docker示例，您可以查看。

trans-unit.source: We have begun to aggregate failures and other stats ourselves instead of relying on Mocha reporters. Fixes #1141.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经开始自己汇总失败和其他统计信息，而不是依赖于Mocha记者。修复＃1141。

trans-unit.source: We have better error handling and messaging around Xvfb failures.
trans-unit.target: 我们围绕Xvfb故障有更好的错误处理和消息传递。

trans-unit.source: We have built Cypress to support this use case. In fact, Cypress does not clean up its own internal state when the test ends. We want you to have dangling state at the end of the test! Things like stubs, spies, even routes are not removed at the end of the test. This means your application will behave identically while it is running Cypress commands or when you manually work with it after a test ends.
trans-unit.target: 我们构建了赛普拉斯来支持该用例。实际上，当测试结束时，赛普拉斯不会清理自己的内部状态。我们希望您在测试结束时保持悬挂状态！喜欢的东西 stubs ， spies ，甚至 routes 都没有在测试结束时删除。这意味着您的应用程序在运行Cypress命令时或测试结束后手动使用它时，其行为将相同。

trans-unit.source: We have created a @cypress/webpack-preprocessor preprocessor npm package for you webpack users (because we are nice ￰ﾟﾘﾉ). Fixes #676.
trans-unit.target: 我们为您的webpack用户创建了一个 @cypress/webpack-preprocessor 程序npm软件包（因为我们很不错￰ﾟ ﾘ ﾉ）。修复＃676。

trans-unit.source: We have currently added only one event for modifying the test file preprocessor, but this paves the way for adding many more event types. You can now modify every aspect of how files are sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 当前，我们仅添加了一个用于修改测试文件预处理器的事件，但这为添加更多事件类型铺平了道路。现在，您可以修改如何将文件发送到浏览器的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: We have done our very best to create as little breaking changes as possible.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经尽了最大的努力,尽可能少的产生断裂的变化。

trans-unit.source: We have extracted the default Browserify preprocessor into its own package - @cypress/browserify-preprocessor. This is bundled with Cypress, but it is extracted so it can be used / modified by you to change the default options we pass to Browserify. Additionally, you can swap out this preprocessor for something else entirely.
trans-unit.target: 我们已将默认的Browserify预处理程序提取到其自己的程序包- @cypress/browserify-preprocessor 。它与赛普拉斯捆绑在一起，但已提取出来，因此您可以使用/修改它，以更改我们传递给Browserify的默认选项。此外，您可以将该预处理器完全替换为其他东西。

trans-unit.source: We have launched a “CSS Selector Playground”, a new UI button in the Test Runner that enables you to highlight elements in your application and receive a unique selector. You can also find elements by their text content. These mimics cy.get() and cy.contains() behavior. Additionally you can copy the generated Cypress command to your clipboard or output the generated selector to your console. This feature is in beta. It only works in Chrome (not in Electron). We are aware of some bugs in it, but it is good enough for use and feedback. Please check out issue #917, watch an animated gif demonstration, and leave any feedback you have there. Fixes #917.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经启动了“ CSS选择器游乐场”，这是Test Runner中的新UI按钮，可让您突出显示应用程序中的元素并接收唯一的选择器。您还可以通过其文本内容查找元素。这些模仿 cy.get() 和 cy.contains() 行为。另外，您可以将生成的Cypress命令复制到剪贴板或将生成的选择器输出到控制台。此功能处于测试阶段。它仅适用于Chrome（不适用于Electron）。我们知道其中存在一些错误，但是足够使用和反馈了。请查看问题＃917，观看动画gif演示，并在此处留下任何反馈。修复＃917。

trans-unit.source: We have many more examples and use cases of cy.then() in our Core Concept Guide that teaches you how to properly deal with asynchronous code, when to use variables, and what aliasing is.
trans-unit.target: 我们还有很多例子和用例 cy.then() 我们的核心理念指南，教你如何正确处理异步代码时使用变量，什么走样。

trans-unit.source: We have many new plugin events we are adding.
trans-unit.target: 我们有很多新的插件事件，我们正在增加。

trans-unit.source: We have new instructions on how to set up GitHub Integration with the Cypress Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 我们提供了有关如何与赛普拉斯仪表板设置GitHub集成的新说明。

trans-unit.source: We have now pinned this snapshot. Hovering over other commands will not revert to them. This gives us a chance to manually inspect the DOM of our application under test at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已固定此快照。将鼠标悬停在其他命令上将不会还原为它们。这使我们有机会在拍摄快照时手动检查测试中的应用程序的DOM。

trans-unit.source: We have officially implemented our Sinon.JS integration: adding cy.stub(), cy.spy(), cy.clock(), and cy.tick(). We’ve matched Sinon’s APIs and added sinon-as-promised and chai-sinon. In addition we’ve fixed Sinon performance issues, and improved the display of assertion passes and failures.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经正式实现了Sinon.JS集成：添加 cy.stub() ， cy.spy() ， cy.clock() 和 cy.tick() 。我们已经匹配了Sinon的API，并添加了 sinon-as-promised 和 chai-sinon 。此外，我们还修复了Sinon性能问题，并改进了声明通过和失败的显示。

trans-unit.source: We have officially launched the new Plugins API interface. This adds a cypress/plugins/index.js file to new and existing projects. Using this file will enable you to modify the internals of Cypress running in the background node process. This means you will be able to use node APIs that are executed outside of the browser.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经正式启动了新的Plugins API接口。这会将 cypress/plugins/index.js 文件添加到新项目和现有项目。使用此文件，您可以修改在后台 node 进程中运行的赛普拉斯的内部。这意味着您将能够使用在浏览器之外执行的 node API。

trans-unit.source: We have officially released our Dashboard which is our service that will display recorded runs.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经正式发布了仪表板，这是我们的服务，它将显示记录的运行。

trans-unit.source: We have published a utility npm module, add-typescript-to-cypress, that sets TypeScript test transpilation for you with a single command.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经发布了一个实用程序npm模块add-typescript-to-cypress，它可以通过一个命令为您设置TypeScript测试转换。

trans-unit.source: We have rewritten the entire proxy layer of the Cypress server to finally fix all the problems with CORS.
trans-unit.target: 我们重写了Cypress服务器的整个代理层,终于解决了CORS的所有问题。

trans-unit.source: We have several examples of doing this in our logging in recipes.
trans-unit.target: 在我们的登录食谱中,我们有几个这样做的例子。

trans-unit.source: We have several more examples in our Core Concepts Guide which go into the various ways you can use .then() to store, compare, and debug values.
trans-unit.target: 在“ 核心概念指南”中，我们还有更多示例，涉及使用 .then() 来存储，比较和调试值的各种方式。

trans-unit.source: We have several more examples in our Core Concepts Guide which go into the various ways you can use .then() to store, compare, and debug values.
We have some newly translated documentation in Chinese and Japanese. If you’d like to help in translating more, please open a pull request in our documentation repo.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些中文和日文的新翻译文档。如果您想帮助翻译更多内容，请在我们的文档repo中打开请求请求。

trans-unit.source: We have updated all of the docs related to these changes. The CI Docs got a much needed facelift.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经更新了所有与这些更改有关的文档。该CI文件得到了急需的换装。

trans-unit.source: We have upgraded the Chromium that runs headlessly on cypress run to version 51.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经将 Chromium 升级为 51 版，该Chromium可以在 cypress run 无头运行。

trans-unit.source: We improved error logging and the user experience around cypress verify. Fixes #1984.
trans-unit.target: 我们改进了错误记录功能，并改善了 cypress verify 的用户体验。修复＃1984。

trans-unit.source: We improved the sinon-chai assertion output by changing what is displayed during a passing vs. failing test.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过更改通过和未通过测试期间显示的内容，改进了 sinon-chai 断言输出。

trans-unit.source: We improved the error message displayed when a record key is unrecognized during cypress run. Addresses #1449.
trans-unit.target: 我们改进了在 cypress run 期间无法识别记录键时显示的错误消息。地址＃1449。

trans-unit.source: We improved the logic around when and if we scaffold files on a new project. We’re much smarter about this and not generating these forcibly every time. Fixes #285.
trans-unit.target: 我们改进了何时以及是否将文件放在新项目中的逻辑。我们对此更加聪明，不会每次都强制生成这些信息。修复＃285。

trans-unit.source: We improved the typings when using Cypress.on to listen for window.alert events to allow for Sinon.stub. Fixes #3451.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 Cypress.on 监听 window.alert 事件以允许 Sinon.stub 时，我们改进了打字方式。修复＃3451。

trans-unit.source: We increased the cypress binary verification phase from 10 seconds to 30 seconds to accomodate underpowered or overwhelmed machines typically found in CI environments. Addresses #4624.
trans-unit.target: 我们将cypress二进制验证阶段从10秒增加到30秒，以适应CI环境中通常功率不足或不堪重负的机器。地址＃4624。

trans-unit.source: We know that in order for us to be successful we must enable, nurture, and foster an ecosystem that thrives on open source. Every line of test code is an investment in your codebase, it will never be coupled to us as a paid service or company. Tests will be able to run and work independently, always.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道，要使我们成功，我们必须启用，培育和培育一个可以在开源上蓬勃发展的生态系统。测试代码的每一行都是您代码库中的一项投资，它永远不会与我们作为付费服务或公司相结合。测试将能够独立运行和工作，始终。

trans-unit.source: We made some changes to internal references of headed and headless to be more specific and instead reference run mode and interactive mode. Fixes #1140.
trans-unit.target: 我们对 headed 和 headless 的内部引用进行了一些更改，以更具体些，改为引用 run mode 和 interactive mode 。修复＃1140。

trans-unit.source: We make it simple to:
trans-unit.target: 我们让它变得简单。

trans-unit.source: We make our best effort to synchronize taking a screenshot with our renderer, but the current state of your application under test could have changed in the meantime and not be an accurate representation of what you want to capture.
trans-unit.target: 我们会尽最大努力使截图与渲染器同步,但您测试中的应用程序的当前状态可能在此期间发生了变化,并不能准确地反映您想要捕捉的内容。

trans-unit.source: We mentioned previously that Cypress waited 4 seconds before timing out finding a DOM element - but in this case, when Cypress detects a page transition event it automatically increases the timeout to 60 seconds for the single PAGE LOAD event.
trans-unit.target: 前面我们提到过，赛普拉斯在超时之前未找到DOM元素要等待4秒钟 -但是，在这种情况下，赛普拉斯检测到 page transition event 它将自动将单个 PAGE LOAD 事件的超时增加到60秒。

trans-unit.source: We most often see test code that like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们最常看到的测试代码是这样的。

trans-unit.source: We moved the location of the browser’s disk cache. That means that if you’ve been using Cypress for a really long time - you may have built up quite a large existing cache (in the hundreds of mb). Before upgrading, you should open the browser and then manually clear the Cache. Or - if you have already upgraded to 2.0.0 delete the following folders:
trans-unit.target: 我们移动了浏览器磁盘缓存的位置。这意味着，如果您已经使用赛普拉斯很长时间了，那么您可能已经建立了相当大的现有缓存（数百 mb ）。升级之前，您应该打开浏览器，然后手动清除缓存。或者-如果您已经升级到 2.0.0 ,请删除以下文件夹：

trans-unit.source: We need to configure the reporter in cypress.json to skip the HTML report generation and save each individual JSON file in the cypress/results folder.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要在 cypress.json 中配置报告器，以跳过HTML报告的生成，并将每个单独的JSON文件保存在 cypress/results 文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: We need to install additional dependencies including Mocha itself.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要安装额外的依赖关系,包括Mocha本身。

trans-unit.source: We need to install several dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要安装几个依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: We no longer abort XHR request during the page’s unload event and allow the browser to handle natively calling abort. Fixes #2968.
trans-unit.target: 在页面的 unload 事件期间，我们不再中止XHR请求，并允许浏览器处理本机调用中止。修复＃2968。

trans-unit.source: We no longer artificially restrict the environment cypress ci can run in. It can now run anywhere. Fixes #296.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再人为地限制 cypress ci 可以运行的环境。现在它可以在任何地方运行。修复＃296。

trans-unit.source: We no longer delay proxied responses with no body with status codes 1xx, 204, 304. This fixes a regression introduced in 3.2.0 where responses with these status codes were delayed when using a proxy. Fixes #4298.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再延迟没有主体的状态代码为1xx，204、304的代理响应。这修复了3.2.0中引入的回归，该回归在使用代理时会延迟具有这些状态代码的响应。修复＃4298。

trans-unit.source: We no longer format fixtures in any capacity. This fixes a bug with improperly formatting fixtures in Windows. You should handle formatting fixtures yourself. Fixes #884 and #902.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再以任何容量格式化装置。这修复了Windows中格式不正确的固定装置的错误。您应该自己处理格式化装置。修复＃884和＃902。

trans-unit.source: We no longer log the skipping install message if the Cypress binary is already installed locally. Fixes #1985.
trans-unit.target: 如果赛普拉斯二进制文件已经在本地 skipping install 我们将不再记录跳过安装消息。修复＃1985。

trans-unit.source: We no longer package non-Windows FFmpeg builds with Windows builds, resulting in a 35-40% reduction in zipped size and a 36-43% reduction in unzipped size of download. Addresses #3888.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再将非Windows FFmpeg构建与Windows构建打包在一起，从而使压缩大小减少了35-40％，下载的未压缩大小减少了36-43％。地址＃3888。

trans-unit.source: We no longer send Sinon to the remote application under test. In other words, you’ll no longer see sinon.js being sent as a network request.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再将Sinon发送到正在测试的远程应用程序。换句话说，您将不再看到 sinon.js 作为网络请求发送。

trans-unit.source: We no longer trash the wrong folder on OSX in-app updates (when a project is open). Sorry about this! Fixes #260.
trans-unit.target: 当项目打开时，我们不再将错误的文件夹丢在OSX应用内更新上。为此表示歉意！修复＃260。

trans-unit.source: We no longer watch the supportFile while running cypress run. Fixes #329.
trans-unit.target: 在运行 cypress run 时，我们不再观看 supportFile 。修复＃329。

trans-unit.source: We no longer write the chrome extension within node_modules, and instead write this to the proper OS specific appData folder. Fixes #245 and #290.
trans-unit.target: 我们不再将chrome扩展名写入 node_modules 内，而是将其扩展至特定 appData 操作系统的appData文件夹。修复＃245和＃290。

trans-unit.source: We now append (failed) to the screenshot filename of screenshots taken automatically during test failure. Fixes #1923.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将 (failed) 附加（失败）到在测试失败期间自动获取的屏幕快照的屏幕快照文件名。修复＃1923。

trans-unit.source: We now automatically drop frames that the CPU cannot keep up with while video recording during cypress run. Previously we would buffer all frames in memory and it was possible to exhaust all memory due to the way that streaming backpressure works. Fixes #302.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们自动删除在 cypress run 期间进行视频录制时CPU无法跟上的帧。以前，我们会在内存中缓冲所有帧，由于流背压的工作方式，有可能耗尽所有内存。修复＃302。

trans-unit.source: We now better support capturing environment variables within Azure DevOps. Addresses #3657.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们更好地支持在Azure DevOps中捕获环境变量。地址＃3657。

trans-unit.source: We now capture cross origin errors correctly instead of these showing as Uncaught DOMExceptions in the console. Fixes #261.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以正确捕获 cross origin 错误，而不是在控制台中显示为 Uncaught DOMExceptions 。修复＃261。

trans-unit.source: We now capture environment variables set from Concourse CI when recording tests to the Dashboard. Fixes #4376.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当将测试记录到仪表板上时，我们捕获从Concourse CI设置的环境变量。修复＃4376。

trans-unit.source: We now capture synchronous errors from XHR onreadystatechange handlers.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们从XHR onreadystatechange 处理程序捕获同步错误。

trans-unit.source: We now collect “global” errors that may prevent any tests from running. We will be displaying these in our future CI platform.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们收集可能阻止任何测试运行的“全局”错误。我们将在未来的CI平台中显示这些内容。

trans-unit.source: We now collect Semaphore CI params and provide URL’s to click into the builds from the Dashboard. Fixes #1785.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们收集信号量CI参数，并提供URL，以从仪表板中单击构建。修复＃1785。

trans-unit.source: We now correctly handle form submission when using .type('{enter}') on a form containing a button of type reset. Fixes #3909.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在包含 reset 类型按钮的表单上使用 .type('{enter}') 时，我们可以正确处理表单提交。修复＃3909。

trans-unit.source: We now correctly store local data in each operating system’s correct Application Data area. This will be more resilient to upgrades in the future.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将本地数据正确存储在每个操作系统的正确 Application Data 区域中。这将对将来的升级更具弹性。

trans-unit.source: We now display a keyboard ‘modifiers’ column when clicking on a .type() in the Command Log.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在命令日志中单击 .type() 时，将显示键盘的“修饰符”列。

trans-unit.source: We now display a warning in the console when returning a promise from a test and also invoking a Promise or cy commands. Fixes #464.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当从测试中返回承诺并调用Promise或cy命令时，我们会在控制台中显示警告。修复＃464。

trans-unit.source: We now display a warning when passing an argument to --spec that is not surrounded by quotes "" recommending that the argument instead be surrounded by quotes. In some cases, not providing quotes can cause the arguments to be read in a way that is likely not its intended use. Addresses #3318 and #2298.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当将参数传递给 --spec 而不用引号 "" 包围时，将显示警告，建议该参数改为用引号引起来。在某些情况下，不提供引号可能导致以可能不是其预期用途的方式读取参数。地址＃3318和＃2298。

trans-unit.source: We now display better error messages in the CLI when runs exceed billing limits. Fixes #1689.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当运行超出计费限制时，我们会在CLI中显示更好的错误消息。修复＃1689。

trans-unit.source: We now ensure we are shipping with production versions of dependencies such as react, mobx, etc. This should help to prevent conflicts with Developer Tools extensions and increase performance by reducing memory, heap allocation, and overall JS bundle size. Addresses #4844.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们确保附带的是生产版本的依赖项，例如 react ， mobx 等。这应该有助于防止与Developer Tools扩展发生冲突，并通过减少内存，堆分配和整体JS捆绑包大小来提高性能。地址＃4844。

trans-unit.source: We now exit correctly (with status of 1) in the case of headless renderer crashes. Additionally we capture these errors properly, explain what happened, and link to external error document to suggest fixes. Fixes #270 and #348.
trans-unit.target: 在无头渲染器崩溃的情况下，我们现在可以正确退出（状态为1）。此外，我们会正确捕获这些错误，解释发生了什么，并链接到外部错误文档以提出建议的修复程序。修复＃270和＃348。

trans-unit.source: We now expose a downloadable binary for each commit made into the develop branch of the cypress repository so that pre-released versions can be installed. See this commit for an example. Addresses #4525.
trans-unit.target: 现在，对于在cypress存储库的development 分支中进行的每次提交，我们都公开一个可下载的二进制文件，以便可以安装预发行版本。有关示例，请参见此提交。地址＃4525。

trans-unit.source: We now expose all jQuery methods and values onto Cypress.$. Fixes #2830.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将所有jQuery方法和值公开到 Cypress.$ 。修复＃2830。

trans-unit.source: We now get the absolute paths of styles to use when displaying snapshots. This will fix situations where some stylesheets were improperly referenced during the snapshot, so did not display styles correctly. Fixes #525.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们获得了显示快照时要使用的样式的绝对路径。这将解决以下情况：在快照期间未正确引用某些样式表，因此无法正确显示样式的情况。修复＃525。

trans-unit.source: We now handle HTTP request errors much better. Previously if your web server sent us back a 4xx or 5xx response we would automatically send back a 500. Now we transparently pass these through.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以更好地处理HTTP请求错误。以前，如果您的网络服务器向我们发送了 4xx 或 5xx 响应，我们将自动向您发送 500 。现在我们透明地将它们传递出去。

trans-unit.source: We now handle Xvfb exiting with a non zero status code and display that error to you. This should help with situations where Xvfb is misconfigured on the system. Fixes #1113.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们使用非零状态代码处理Xvfb退出，并向您显示该错误。这应有助于在系统上错误配置Xvfb的情况。修复＃1113。

trans-unit.source: We now have full blown subdomain support. This means you can now navigate to a subdomain either directly via a cy.visit() or by navigating in your application naturally (such as clicking an <a>).
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们拥有完整的子域支持。这意味着您现在可以直接通过 cy.visit() 或自然地在应用程序中导航（例如单击 <a> ）导航到子域。

trans-unit.source: We now ignore watching node_modules, bower_components and a few other folders to reduce the number of watched files. Fixes #437.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们忽略监视 node_modules ， bower_components 和其他一些文件夹，以减少监视文件的数量。修复＃437。

trans-unit.source: We now indicate which XHRs match which alias in the Command Log on .wait() when they match an alias multiple times. Addresses #477.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当它们多次匹配别名时，在 .wait() 上的命令登录中指示哪些XHR与哪个别名匹配。地址＃477。

trans-unit.source: We now launch Chrome with --no-sandbox and --disable-gpu options in Linux. We will soon release a new plugin event that enables you to modify the browser arguments we use by default. This shouldn’t cause issues with existing Linux users, and instead it should fix many CI setups that were using our Docker containers or your own home grown installed Chrome setup. Fixes #1021 and #1020.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在Linux中使用 --no-sandbox 和 --disable-gpu 选项启动Chrome 。我们即将发布一个新的插件事件，使您可以修改默认情况下使用的浏览器参数。这不会给现有的Linux用户造成问题，而是应该修复使用我们的Docker容器或您自己的本地安装的Chrome安装程序的许多CI安装程序。修复＃1021和＃1020。

trans-unit.source: We now launch Cypress tests directly to the baseUrl to avoid an initial page refresh when encountering the first cy.visit() command. This should help tests run faster. Fixes #382.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在直接启动赛普拉斯测试到 baseUrl 遇到第一个时避免初始页面刷新 cy.visit() 命令。这应该有助于测试运行更快。修复＃382。

trans-unit.source: We now list all of the recorded runs directly in the Test Runner under a new Runs tab. Fixes #236.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们直接在“测试运行器”的新“ Runs 选项卡下列出所有记录的运行。修复＃236。

trans-unit.source: We now no longer abort XHR’s which have their .abort() method called but are already complete. This fixes an edge case where complete XHR’s were having their disposer function called in frameworks like rxJS which lead to Cypress accidentally re-aborting the XHR’s after they were complete. Fixes #761.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们不再中止具有 .abort() 方法但已经完成的XHR 。这解决了一个 rxJS 情况，即完整的XHR 在诸如rxJS之类的框架中调用了其 disposer 功能，这导致赛普拉斯在XHR完成后意外中止了中止工作。修复＃761。

trans-unit.source: We now no longer remove spies, stubs, or routes at the end of the very last test. This enables you to continue to manually use your app and have Cypress continue to instrument it.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在不再在最后一次测试结束时删除间谍、存根或路由。这使您可以继续手动使用您的应用程序,并让Cypress继续对其进行测试。

trans-unit.source: We now offer a separate 32bit and 64bit build for Windows. Addresses #716, #787, #2095, #706, #3706, and #4016.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们为Windows提供了单独的32位和64位版本。地址＃716，＃787，＃2095，＃706，＃3706和＃4016。

trans-unit.source: We now only mount internal servers on loopback. Addresses #3712.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们仅将内部服务器安装在 loopback 。地址＃3712。

trans-unit.source: We now opt into gzip handling instead of forcing requests to omit it.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们选择使用 gzip 处理，而不是强制请求将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: We now pass any reporter errors along and provide a stack if a custom reporter you’ve provided does not exist. Fixes #1192.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将传递所有报告程序错误，并在您提供的自定义报告程序不存在时提供堆栈。修复＃1192。

trans-unit.source: We now pass the --disable-device-discovery-notifications flag automatically. This should prevent Chromium browser from automatically trying to communicate with devices in your network, such as printers, while running tests. Fixes #1600.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们自动传递 --disable-device-discovery-notifications 标志。这样可以防止Chromium浏览器在运行测试时自动尝试与网络中的设备（例如打印机）进行通信。修复＃1600。

trans-unit.source: We now pass the Chromium command line switches --use-fake-ui-for-media-stream and --use-fake-device-for-media-stream to Chrome by default in order to better support testing webcam functionality. Fixes #2704.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们默认将Chromium命令行开关 --use-fake-ui-for-media-stream 和 --use-fake-device-for-media-stream 传递给Chrome，以更好地支持测试网络摄像头功能。修复＃2704。

trans-unit.source: We now preserve the Test Runner’s position and sizing after it’s closed + reopened. Fixes #443.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在关闭+重新打开后，我们保留了“测试运行器”的位置和大小。修复＃443。

trans-unit.source: We now prevent cy.visit() from accidentally snapshotting twice.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们防止 cy.visit() 意外快照两次。

trans-unit.source: We now print the browser and browser version run in the output during cypress run. #833.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在 cypress run 期间打印浏览器，并在输出中运行浏览器版本。＃833。

trans-unit.source: We now properly detect the branch name when running Cypress in AppVeyor. Fixed in #4234.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在AppVeyor中运行Cypress时，我们可以正确检测分支名称。已在＃4234中修复。

trans-unit.source: We now properly display nested objects and arrays that come from cypress.json in the Settings tab in the Desktop Application.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在桌面应用程序的“设置”选项卡中正确显示来自 cypress.json 的嵌套对象和数组。

trans-unit.source: We now properly strip leading paths of files on uncaught errors from Windows OS. Fixes #2936.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们可以正确删除Windows操作系统中未捕获的错误的文件前导路径。修复＃2936。

trans-unit.source: We now properly take the maxAge cookie flag into account and give it preference over the expires flag as per the cookie spec.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在走好 maxAge 饼干标志进去，并给它偏爱在 expires 标志按该cookie规范。

trans-unit.source: We now record videos during a headless run with both cypress ci and cypress run. Fixes #229.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在 cypress ci 和 cypress run 的无头运行中录制视频。修复＃229。

trans-unit.source: We now run each spec file in isolation from one another. This shouldn’t technically break anything, but if you have set up your tests in a way that requires the state of a previous spec file, this could potentially break your tests. This will go a long ways towards reducing problems we were seeing with long runs in CI. Fixes #431, #681, #1589, #1539, and #1692.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们彼此隔离地运行每个规范文件。从技术上讲，这不应该破坏任何东西，但是，如果您以要求先前规范文件状态的方式设置测试，则可能会破坏测试。这将大大减少我们长期以来在CI中看到的问题。修复＃431，＃681，＃1589，＃1539和＃1692。

trans-unit.source: We now set the form option to true if the Content-Type header equals application/x-www-form-urlencoded and json is not already set by a user. This fixes a situation where Cypress would try to parse the body as a string, resulting in a confusing error message. Fixes #2923.
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果 Content-Type 标头等于 application/x-www-form-urlencoded ,并且用户尚未设置 json ,则将 form 选项设置为 true 。这就解决了赛普拉斯试图将 body 解析为字符串的情况，从而导致令人困惑的错误消息。修复＃2923。

trans-unit.source: We now show the entire scaffolded tree of files when adding a brand new project. Fixes #401.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当添加一个全新的项目时，我们显示文件的整个支架树。修复＃401。

trans-unit.source: We now support ES2015+, modules, and JSX in all spec files. Fixes #246.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在所有规范文件中都支持ES2015 +，模块和JSX。修复＃246。

trans-unit.source: We now support per-project state.json. Fixes #512.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们支持每个项目 state.json 。修复＃512。

trans-unit.source: We now throw a descriptive error if an alias using .as() was defined starting with the @ character. #1643.
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果定义了使用 .as() 的别名（以 @ 字符开头），则会引发描述性错误。＃1643。

trans-unit.source: We now throw when a value other than cy is returned from a test or command function. Fixes #463.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们从测试或命令函数返回 cy 以外的值时抛出。修复＃463。

trans-unit.source: We now truncate filenames for screenshots to not exceed 255 characters in length. Previously there were cases where the screenshot filename would exceed 255 characters and error. Fixes #2403 and #2665.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们截断屏幕快照的文件名长度不能超过255个字符。以前，有时屏幕快照文件名会超过255个字符并出现错误。修复＃2403和＃2665。

trans-unit.source: We now validate all of the configuration options set in cypress.json to ensure it has valid types. Fixes #399.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们验证 cypress.json 中设置的所有配置选项，以确保其具有有效的类型。修复＃399。

trans-unit.source: We now validate that baseUrl is accessible prior to running tests. This prevents a common situation where you may forget to boot your web server and have instantly failing tests. Fixes #383.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们在运行测试之前验证 baseUrl 是否可访问。这样可以避免常见的情况，即您可能忘记引导Web服务器并立即导致测试失败。修复＃383。

trans-unit.source: We output a much more complete test results object when using cypress as a module. Fixes #1248.
trans-unit.target: 当使用cypress作为模块时，我们输出一个更完整的测试结果对象。修复＃1248。

trans-unit.source: We print a warning when using an older CLI tool version. Fixes #424.
trans-unit.target: 使用较旧的CLI工具版本时，我们会打印警告。修复＃424。

trans-unit.source: We recently gave a “Best Practices” conference talk at AssertJS (February 2018). This video demonstrates how to approach breaking down your application and organizing your tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们最近在AssertJS上进行了“最佳实践”会议演讲（2018年2月）。该视频演示了如何分解应用程序并组织测试。

trans-unit.source: We recommend not exporting the CYPRESS_RUN_BINARY environment variable, since it will affect every cypress module installed on your file system.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议不出口的 CYPRESS_RUN_BINARY 环境变量，因为它会影响您的安装文件系统上的每个柏树模块。

trans-unit.source: We recommend placing debugger or using the .debug() command directly BEFORE the action.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在操作之前直接放置 debugger 或直接使用 .debug() 命令。

trans-unit.source: We recommend setting a baseUrl when using cy.visit().
trans-unit.target: 我们建议设置 baseUrl 使用时 cy.visit() 。

trans-unit.source: We recommend the following configuration in a tsconfig.json inside your cypress folder.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在 cypress 文件夹内的 tsconfig.json 中进行以下配置。

trans-unit.source: We recommend users:
trans-unit.target: 我们推荐用户。

trans-unit.source: We reduced memory consumption and improved the performance of running tests anytime you’re inside of cypress open. Fixes #2366. Thanks @CoryDanielson!
trans-unit.target: 当您在 cypress open 内时，我们减少了内存消耗并提高了运行测试的性能。修复＃2366。谢谢@CoryDanielson！

trans-unit.source: We removed an artificial delay that was being set in between commands. This means test commands now run faster.
trans-unit.target: 我们删除了在命令之间设置的人为延迟。这意味着测试命令现在运行得更快。

trans-unit.source: We removed erroneous socket connections when the browser is initially launching. Fixes #4776.
trans-unit.target: 最初启动浏览器时，我们删除了错误的套接字连接。修复＃4776。

trans-unit.source: We removed scaffolding any directories on a new project (during cypress run). Fixes #295.
trans-unit.target: 我们删除了脚手架在新项目上的所有目录（在 cypress run 期间）。修复＃295。

trans-unit.source: We renamed CYPRESS_CI_KEY TO CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY. This makes it clearer what this key actually does - and the fact that it can be run anywhere irrespective of CI. We still look for the old named key but will print a warning if we detect it.
trans-unit.target: 我们改名 CYPRESS_CI_KEY TO CYPRESS_RECORD_KEY 。这样可以更清楚地知道此密钥的实际作用-以及无论CI如何都可以在任何地方运行它的事实。我们仍在寻找旧的命名密钥，但是如果我们检测到它，将打印警告。

trans-unit.source: We replaced Sinon’s argument stringifier for a much less noisy, more performant, custom version.
trans-unit.target: 我们用噪音更小，性能更高的自定义版本替换了锡农的参数字符串化器。

trans-unit.source: We replaced capturing environment variables from SnapCI (which is no longer available) to instead capture ones set from GoCD when recording tests to the Dashboard. Fixes #2680.
trans-unit.target: 在将测试记录到仪表板时，我们从SnapCI（不再可用）中替换了捕获环境变量，以捕获从GoCD设置的变量。修复＃2680。

trans-unit.source: We rewrote the entire driver (we’ve all been there) and converted all 2,500+ tests to be run within Cypress itself.
trans-unit.target: 我们重写了整个驱动程序（我们都去过那里），并将所有2500多个测试转换为在赛普拉斯本身内运行。

trans-unit.source: We see many of our users adding code to an after or afterEach hook in order to clean up the state generated by the current test(s).
trans-unit.target: 我们看到许多用户将代码添加到 after 或 afterEach 挂钩中，以清理当前测试所生成的状态。

trans-unit.source: We see many of our users creating their own visitApp command. We commonly see that all you’re doing is swapping out base urls for development vs production environments.
trans-unit.target: 我们看到许多用户创建了自己的 visitApp 命令。我们通常会看到，您要做的只是将基本URL换成 development 和 production 环境。

trans-unit.source: We see new users commonly write code that looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们看到新用户普遍写的代码是这样的。

trans-unit.source: We stopped minifying vendor.js (for real this time). More optimizations to come around this.
trans-unit.target: 我们停止了缩小 vendor.js 的工作（这次是真实的）。更多优化可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: We suggest reading through the source code here to see all of the methods and what they do.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议您在此处通读源代码，以了解所有方法及其作用。

trans-unit.source: We suggest using the excellent npm module:
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用优秀的npm模块。

trans-unit.source: We support and display multiple sub spies when using Sinon’s .withArgs(...) function.
trans-unit.target: 使用Sinon的 .withArgs(...) 函数时，我们支持并显示多个子间谍。

trans-unit.source: We understand that when Cypress is running in its own profile it can be difficult to tell the difference between your normal browser and Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道,当Cypress在自己的配置文件中运行时,很难区分您的普通浏览器和Cypress之间的区别。

trans-unit.source: We updated and removed some dependencies used for development.
trans-unit.target: 我们更新并删除了一些用于开发的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: We updated how we handle trashAssetsBeforeRuns behavior. We now trash the contents of the screenshotsFolder and videosFolder directories instead of trashing the directories themselves. This helps maintain any file access permissions for the directories. Fixes #1943 and #2600.
trans-unit.target: 我们更新了如何处理 trashAssetsBeforeRuns 行为。现在，我们将 screenshotsFolder 和 videosFolder 目录的内容删除，而不是将目录本身删除。这有助于维护目录的所有文件访问权限。修复＃1943和＃2600。

trans-unit.source: We updated some of our internal ESLint rules to be more strict and also to help with CoffeeScript to JavaScript conversions. Fixes #2688.
trans-unit.target: 我们更新了一些内部ESLint规则，使其更加严格，也有助于将CoffeeScript转换为JavaScript。修复＃2688。

trans-unit.source: We updated the messaging when there is a failure downloading Cypress to recommend checking your proxy settings. Addresses #1662.
trans-unit.target: 当赛普拉斯下载失败时，我们更新了消息传递，建议您检查代理设置。地址＃1662。

trans-unit.source: We upgraded the lodash dependency to fix a security vulnerability warning. Fixes #4699, #4730, #4743.
trans-unit.target: 我们升级了 lodash 依赖关系以修复安全漏洞警告。修复＃4699，＃4730，＃4743。

trans-unit.source: We upgraded the mocha-teamcity-reporter dependency so that it no longer errors in certain situations when trying to access duration on tests. Fixes #4654.
trans-unit.target: 我们升级了 mocha-teamcity-reporter 依赖性，以便在尝试访问测试持续时间时在某些情况下不再出错。修复＃4654。

trans-unit.source: We use multiple reporters for every single one of our internal projects.
trans-unit.target: 我们内部的每一个项目都会使用多个记者。

trans-unit.source: We want the Command Log and the console in the DevTools to log specific properties of our custom command.
We want to help developers build a new generation of modern applications faster, better, and without the stress and anxiety associated with managing tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望帮助开发人员更快、更好地构建新一代的现代应用程序,并且没有与管理测试相关的压力和焦虑。

trans-unit.source: We want to make sure every statement and function in the file add.js has been executed by our tests at least once. Thus we write a test:
trans-unit.target: 我们要确保文件 add.js 中的每个语句和函数都已被我们的测试至少执行了一次。因此，我们编写了一个测试：

trans-unit.source: We want to output a “spec” report to STDOUT, while saving Mochawesome JSON reports and then combine them into a single report.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望将“规范”报告 STDOUT 到STDOUT，同时保存Mochawesome JSON报告，然后将它们合并为一个报告。

trans-unit.source: We will NOT perform these:
trans-unit.target: 我们不会进行这些。

trans-unit.source: We will automatically apply the record key environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 我们将自动应用记录键环境变量。

trans-unit.source: We will continue to follow semver from this point on (and also a bit more rigorously).
trans-unit.target: semver 起，我们将继续遵循semver的要求（也将更加严格）。

trans-unit.source: We will learn more about assertions later in this guide.
trans-unit.target: 在本指南的后面，我们将学习更多有关断言的信息。

trans-unit.source: We will reiterate one more time. Had the <input> or the <textarea> been rendered asynchronously, you could not use the pattern above. You would have to involve arbitrary delays which will not work in every situation, will slow down your tests, and will still leave chances that your tests are flaky (and are an all-around anti-pattern).
trans-unit.target: 我们将再重申一次。有 <input> 或 <textarea> 是异步呈现的，则不能使用上面的模式。您将不得不引入任意延迟，这在每种情况下都不会起作用，会减慢测试速度，并且仍然有可能使您的测试不稳定（并且是全方位的反模式）。

trans-unit.source: We would likely just need to update our client side code to check whether this query param is present. Now we know ahead of time whether it will or will not be shown.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能只需要更新我们的客户端代码来检查这个query param是否存在。现在我们提前知道它是否会被显示。

trans-unit.source: We’re adding the { matchBase: true } option because under the hood Cypress actually uses that option by default.
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了 { matchBase: true } 选项，因为赛普拉斯默认情况下实际上使用该选项。

trans-unit.source: We’re also paving the way to make it easy to write multiple tests against the “default” state of the form. That way each test stays lean but each can be run independently and pass.
trans-unit.target: 我们还为简化针对表单“默认”状态的多个测试铺平了道路。这样，每个测试都会保持精简，但每个测试都可以独立运行并通过。

trans-unit.source: We’re chaining the .type() onto the cy.get(), telling it to type into the subject yielded from the cy.get() command, which will be a DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 我们将 .type() 链接到 cy.get() 上，告诉它键入 cy.get() 命令产生的主题，该主题将是DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: We’re continuing to make process in converting our codebase from CoffeeScript to JavaScript. Addresses #2690 in #4781 and #4817.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在继续进行将代码库从CoffeeScript转换为JavaScript的过程。地址＃2690在＃4781和＃4817。

trans-unit.source: We’re excited to announce GitHub integration for the Cypress Dashboard. You can now get timely and useful test run information within pull-requests via status checks and pull-request comments. Learn all about it on our blog. Addresses #981.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常高兴地宣布GitHub上集成了赛普拉斯仪表板。现在，您可以通过状态检查和请求请求注释在请求请求中获取及时且有用的测试运行信息。在我们的博客上了解有关它的所有信息。地址＃981。

trans-unit.source: We’ve written a blog post about the 300% increase in proxy performance delivered in 3.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 我们写了一篇博客文章，介绍了3.3.0中提供的代理性能提高了300％。

trans-unit.source: We’ve written a blog post about the 300% increase in proxy performance delivered in 3.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 我们写了一篇博客文章，介绍了 3.3.0 中提供的代理性能提高了300％。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added cy.clock() and cy.tick() which are both asynchronous methods to modify timers in your application under test. We automatically apply clock (even if you invoke it before your first cy.visit()) and will automatically reapply it after page load. cy.tick() will enable you to control the amount of time you want passed in your application. This is great for controlling throttled or debounced functions.
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了 cy.clock() 和 cy.tick() ，它们都是异步方法，可以在被测应用程序中修改计时器。我们会自动应用时钟（即使您在第一个 cy.visit() 之前调用它）也会在页面加载后自动重新应用它。 cy.tick() 将使您能够控制要在应用程序中传递的时间。这对于控制节流或去抖动功能非常有用。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added JUnit as a valid built-in reporters. Fixes #178.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经将 JUnit 添加为有效的内置报告器。修复＃178。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added a new Cypress.Commands interface to handle adding your own custom commands. Fixes #436.
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了一个新的 Cypress.Commands 接口来处理添加您自己的自定义命令。修复＃436。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added a new CLI flag: --no-exit for cypress run to keep the browser open after the tests finish running. Fixes #1871.
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了一个新的CLI标志：-- --no-exit 用于 cypress run 以在测试完成后使浏览器保持打开状态。修复＃1871。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added automatic ES2015+, module, JSX, and CJSX support to all test files. This means you can use require, import, or export declarations to load other files. You can also use this to import your own application specific JavaScript modules and write unit tests for them. More of these details are yet to come. See this issue.
trans-unit.target: 我们已将ES2015 +，模块，JSX和CJSX自动支持添加到所有测试文件。这意味着您可以使用 require ， import 或 export 声明来加载其他文件。您还可以使用它来导入自己的应用程序特定的JavaScript模块并为其编写单元测试。这些细节更多。看到这个问题。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added debug output for Xvfb when DEBUG=cypress:xvfb is enabled. Helpful when diagnosing problems with Xvfb. Fixes #1128.
trans-unit.target: 当启用 DEBUG=cypress:xvfb 时，我们为Xvfb添加了调试输出。诊断Xvfb问题时很有帮助。修复＃1128。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added more TypeScript documentation for cy.* methods. Fixes #1117.
trans-unit.target: 我们为 cy.* 方法添加了更多TypeScript文档。修复＃1117。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added our own special aliasing flavor to cy.stub() and cy.spy(). You can use the .as() command and we will associate spy and stub invocations (the same way we do with XHR aliasing and route matching).
trans-unit.target: 我们在 cy.stub() 和 cy.spy() 中添加了自己的特殊别名。您可以使用 .as() 命令，我们将把间谍和存根调用关联起来（与XHR别名和路由匹配的方式相同）。

trans-unit.source: We’ve added parallelization to our own internal tests for the driver and the desktop-gui. We’ve been able to reduce the number of concurrent instances our tests use by 4, and shaved about 6 minutes off of each build. Faster with less resources. Fixes #2325.
trans-unit.target: 我们已将并行化添加到我们自己的驱动程序和desktop-gui内部测试中。我们已经能够将测试使用的并发实例数量减少4个，并且每次构建都节省了大约6分钟的时间。资源更少，速度更快。修复＃2325。

trans-unit.source: We’ve also added some recipes showing how to utilize these preprocessors.
trans-unit.target: 我们还添加了一些食谱，展示了如何利用这些预处理器。

trans-unit.source: We’ve also added the two most common 3rd party reporters for Mocha. These are built into Cypress and you can use them without installing anything.
trans-unit.target: 我们还为Mocha添加了两个最常见的第三方记者。这些都是赛普拉斯内置的，您无需安装即可使用它们。

trans-unit.source: We’ve begun automating our dependency update process in order to avoid accidental dependency updates. Addresses #2990 and #3025.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免意外的依赖关系更新，我们已经开始使依赖关系更新过程自动化。地址＃2990和＃3025。

trans-unit.source: We’ve bypassed Mocha’s default uncaught error handling and replaced it with something much better - actually using the thrown error instances instead of creating a new arbitrary one. This means you’ll see better stack traces on uncaught errors. Fixes #193.
trans-unit.target: 我们绕过了Mocha的默认未捕获错误处理，并用更好的东西代替了它-实际上使用抛出的错误实例，而不是创建一个新的任意实例。这意味着您将在未捕获的错误上看到更好的堆栈跟踪。修复＃193。

trans-unit.source: We’ve bypassed Mocha’s default uncaught error handling in a hook. Normally this immediately ends the run. Instead we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite. This prevents skipping potentially dozens or hundreds of tests downstream that are typically unrelated to the hook failure.
trans-unit.target: 我们在 hook 中绕过了Mocha的默认未捕获错误处理。通常，这会立即结束运行。相反，我们跳过了当前套件中的其余测试。这样可以避免在下游跳过通常与钩子故障无关的数十个或数百个测试。

trans-unit.source: We’ve changed the “Config” tab to now be called “Settings”. We added two new sections to the “Settings” tab which displays your projectId and your Record Key. These sections do a much better job explaining what these are and how you use them.
trans-unit.target: 我们将“配置”选项卡更改为现在的“设置”。我们在“设置”标签中添加了两个新部分，其中显示了您的 projectId 和记录键。这些部分在解释这些内容以及如何使用它们方面做得更好。

trans-unit.source: We’ve created a new example recipes repo to show you common testing scenarios including how to use the new module support.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个新的示例配方仓库，以向您展示常见的测试场景，包括如何使用新的模块支持。

trans-unit.source: We’ve created several recipes covering additional scenarios like dealing with CSRF tokens or testing XHR based login forms.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一些食谱，涵盖了其他场景，例如处理CSRF令牌或测试基于XHR的登录表单。

trans-unit.source: We’ve created three preprocessors as examples for you to look at. These are fully functioning preprocessors.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了三个预处理器作为示例供您查看。这些是功能齐全的预处理器。

trans-unit.source: We’ve designed our API this way because the DOM is a highly mutable object that constantly goes stale. For Cypress to prevent flake, and know when to proceed, we manage commands in a highly controlled deterministic way.
trans-unit.target: 我们之所以设计API，是因为DOM是一个高度可变的对象，并且会不断陈旧。为了使赛普拉斯防止剥落并知道何时进行处理，我们以高度受控的确定性方式来管理命令。

trans-unit.source: We’ve enhanced chai-sinon by improving the output during passes or failures. Fixes #31.
trans-unit.target: 通过改进通过或失败期间的输出，我们增强了 chai-sinon 。修复＃31。

trans-unit.source: We’ve finally tracked down the source of specs “hanging” and failing to start when running Electron. We finally tracked it down to a bug in Electron itself with setting menu when using offscreen rendering. Fixes #2322 and #2294 and #1235 and #1333.
trans-unit.target: 我们终于找到了“挂起”的规格，并在运行Electron时无法启动。我们最终在使用屏幕外渲染时使用设置 menu 将其跟踪到Electron本身的错误。修复＃2322和＃2294和＃1235和＃1333。

trans-unit.source: We’ve fixed some underlying issues with cy.go() during cypress run. It always worked fine in real Chrome. Previously there were some situations where it would not navigate forward / back correctly.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经在 cypress run 期间修复了 cy.go() 的一些潜在问题。在真正的Chrome中，它始终可以正常运行。以前，在某些情况下无法正确向前/向后导航。

trans-unit.source: We’ve fully documented how to do this here.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经在此处完整记录了如何执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: We’ve improved many of the error messages related to recording runs. Fixes #423.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经改善了许多与录制运行有关的错误消息。修复＃423。

trans-unit.source: We’ve improved the logic of how snapshots are restored so that it does not break the CSS when there were full page navigations in the test and the CSS changed. Fixes #223.
trans-unit.target: 我们改进了快照还原的逻辑，以便在测试中进行全页导航并且更改CSS时，它不会破坏CSS。修复＃223。

trans-unit.source: We’ve improved the way we inject content into <html> responses by filtering the underlying HTTP request headers. We no longer inject content into templates which were loaded via XHR. Fixes #257 and #288.
trans-unit.target: 通过过滤基础的HTTP请求标头，我们改进了将内容注入 <html> 响应的方式。我们不再将内容注入通过XHR加载的模板中。修复＃257和＃288。

trans-unit.source: We’ve loosened up the restrictions surrounding what we consider a typeable element. You can now type into inputs with invalid type attributes because the browser does still consider them regular text inputs and allows you to type into them. Fixes #586.
trans-unit.target: 我们放宽了对我们认为是可键入元素的限制。现在，您可以输入具有无效 type 属性的输入内容，因为浏览器仍将其视为常规 text 输入，并允许您对其进行输入。修复＃586。

trans-unit.source: We’ve moved our entire codebase into one into a private “Monorepo”. This is in anticipation for going open source (making the GitHub repo public) and should make it easier for everyone to contribute to our code. Fixes #256.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经将整个代码库合并为一个私有的“ Monorepo”。这是对开源（将GitHub存储库公开）的期望，并且应该使每个人都更容易为我们的代码做出贡献。修复＃256。

trans-unit.source: We’ve programmed our application above so that as soon as the click event happens, the button is removed from the DOM. When Cypress begins processing the next command (.parent()) in the test above, it detects that the yielded subject (the button) is detached from the DOM and throws the error.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经在上面对我们的应用程序进行了编程，以便在 click 事件发生时，就将按钮从DOM中删除。当赛普拉斯开始处理上述测试中的下一个命令（ .parent() ）时，它将检测到所产生的主题（按钮）已与DOM分离，并引发了错误。

trans-unit.source: We’ve put together a new example repo called The Kitchen Sink. It demonstrates usage of every single Cypress command.
trans-unit.target: 我们整理了一个名为The Kitchen Sink的新示例存储库。它演示了每个赛普拉斯命令的用法。

trans-unit.source: We’ve redesigned the headless run stdout to give you more details of the run, the stats after the run, what screenshots were taken, the video that was recorded, compression settings for the video, uploading asset progress, etc.
trans-unit.target: 我们重新设计了无头运行 stdout ，为您提供了运行的更多详细信息，运行后的统计信息，拍摄了哪些截图，录制的视频，视频的压缩设置，上传资产进度等。

trans-unit.source: We’ve removed the configuration option testFolder and renamed it to integrationFolder inside of the cypress.json.
trans-unit.target: 我们删除了配置选项 testFolder ，并将其重命名为 cypress.json 内部的 integrationFolder 。

trans-unit.source: We’ve removed the requirement of filling out an early adopter form and approval for logging in with GitHub to Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 我们删除了填写早期采用者表格和批准使用GitHub登录Cypress的要求。

trans-unit.source: We’ve removed the undocumented cy.chain() command. You should be able to safely remove this from your code. Fixes #456.
trans-unit.target: 我们删除了未记录的 cy.chain() 命令。您应该可以安全地从代码中删除它。修复＃456。

trans-unit.source: We’ve renamed the cypress npm package to be cypress-cli. You’ll see a giant deprecation warning until your scripts have been updated to reference cypress-cli.. You can also uninstall the cypress npm package.
trans-unit.target: 我们将 cypress npm软件包重命名为 cypress-cli 。在脚本更新为引用 cypress-cli 之前，您会看到一个过时的警告。您还可以卸载 cypress npm软件包。

trans-unit.source: We’ve ripped out Sinon’s argument serialization in favor of our own.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经淘汰了诗乃的论点序列化，以支持我们自己的论点。

trans-unit.source: We’ve seen many users writing this kind of code:
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到许多用户在编写这种代码：

trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯一直在谨慎地编写数百个自定义错误消息，试图用简单的术语解释出了什么问题。在这种情况下，赛普拉斯超时重试以查找内容：在整个页面中进行 hype 。
